title: Can't select chromea packs in new draft pick
body: As i picked vayne and went to use dragon slayer i could not pick a chroma for her thought i would report this :D

replies.body:
Hiya! 

This is a [known issue](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/HpUTbovb-known-issues-with-new-champ-select) with the new Champion Select. We're hoping to have this resolved in Patch 6.2. We're having a similar issue with ward skins.

Thank you for the report! ^-^
Same here, just posted about it as well.
wait so you are working to fix the issue but do we get something for compensation?  i use the chroma skins for Morg and Leona.. now i need to wait until next patch??
I use purple bard :/ and hate elderwood. I don't want to be limited to 1 skin again, new bard skin!
